name: squared
description: Converts HTML and SVG into any mobile or desktop UI with the flexibility and accuracy of Chrome. CSS Grid, Flexbox, and CSS/SMIL animations are supported in the Android framework.

scripts.install-chrome: npm i terser && npm i prettier && npm i clean-css && npm i html-minifier && npm i js-beautify
scripts.bundles: node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.$npm_package_version.js
scripts.bundles-win: node bundle.js -f android -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f android -m svg -e android.widget.* -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.android+widget.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -o ./dist/bundles/squared.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js && node bundle.js -f chrome -m svg -o ./dist/bundles/squared+svg.chrome.bundle.%npm_package_version%.js
scripts.md5-snapshot: rimraf temp/snapshot/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b snapshot -o ./temp/snapshot
scripts.md5-snapshot-png: rimraf temp/snapshot/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b snapshot -s 1280x960 -o ./temp/snapshot
scripts.md5-snapshot-raw: rimraf temp/snapshot-raw/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b snapshot-raw -o ./temp/snapshot-raw -f 2 -t 10
scripts.md5-snapshot-chrome: rimraf temp/chrome/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chrome -o ./temp/chrome -e /Applications/Google%20Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google%20Chrome
scripts.md5-snapshot-chrome-win: rimraf temp/chrome/* && node md5sum.js -h http://localhost:3000 -d ./md5/data.csv -b chrome -o ./temp/chrome -e C:/Program%20Files%20(x86)/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe
scripts.dev: tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.dev.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.dev.js && cd ./android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.dev.js
scripts.prod: npm run clean && eslint **/*.ts && tsc -p ./config/tsconfig.prod.json && rollup -c ./config/rollup.config.js && cd ./node-express && eslint **/*.ts && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../android-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../chrome-framework && rollup -c rollup.config.js && cd ../android-widget && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf temp/*
